content: simple toe up sock pattern techniques used turkish cast on magic loop kfb increases fleegle heel and a stretchy bind off yarn 1 skein yarn twisters rylyn 420 yards/115g 80% sw merino 20% nylon or any fingering weight yarn gauge 36 sts by 48 row equal 4 by 4 in stockinette in the round after blocking needles 2 25 mm us 1 40 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge notions removable stitch marker darning needle finished sizes approx foot circumference worn with approx 0-1 of negative ease size 1 7 women s shoe size 4 - 6 5 size 2 8 women s shoe size 7 - 9 5 size 3 9 women s shoe size 10 - 12 5 pattern is written for magic loop technique
